description: The relentless combatant, fueled by fury or it's totem bonds with animals. In tune with the natural order.
A story teller or musician using his wits, magic, and lore to get out of (or avoid) tight situations
A Holy man devoted to a deity. capable of bolstering the party and heal their wounds, or laying low their enemies with divine wrath.

A nomad devoted to the world and the powers of Nature. Capable of adopting the form of a beast for battle or utility. capable of bolstering the party and heal their wounds, or laying low their enemies with nature's wrath
Skilled combatant or strategist typically relying on his heavy armor and weapons to cut down their enemies. His training gives him unique abilities
A martial artist pulling on the power of his own body to produce impressive results.
Nearly as skilled as the Fighter but bolsters his efforts with divine magic. through his devotion he gains special boons from his god.
One who uses a unique blend of wilderness knowledge and martial ability to be a deadly hunter, with a bow, a pet or melee weapons
A thief, assassin or stealthy character who has a knack for picking out his enemies weaknesses and exploiting them.
A magic user who draws his power from within, summoning his innate magical power and bending it to his will
Made a pact with a powerful entity the warlock trades favors for boons and spells.
Keeper of arcane secrets and forgotten knowledge, the wizard manipulates magic and spells with cunning.
